page.title: 10Godalming Times Newspaper
page.content: The Godalming Times publishes 8 000 newspapers a week, and they have been publishing newspapers for about 121 years. They employ 2 full-time and 1 part-time journalist. They have one printing press and a technician but if a computer breaks down the paper may be delayed. It takes 1 week to prepare the paper, 12 hours to sort out which information goes on which page, and it takes 12 minutes to print it. Disasters hit the headlines every week for example, this week's headline is "Animals are dying from poisoning". The Godalming Times has many letters sent to the paper each week about local issues and national events.
